name: SAP-консультант (MM,LE,PM,PP,QM)
description:
Main accountabilities:

  • Regular interaction with business stakeholders and key users from Country/BU/Zone to identify area of improvements and reengineering of business processes. Propose best solutions by choosing right technology tools and rebuilding the processes based on business needs and knowledge of business processes
  • Prepare business cases for financial performance analysis. Align and approve business cases with business stakeholders
  • Participate in building of IT and business function integration roadmap. Make estimation of timeline, recourses and other necessary inputs for projects and changes
  • Responsible for enterprise application integration. This includes defining the opportunities for integration, selecting the tools, specifying the shared data & code resources, defining the interfaces and data-flows, and monitoring the success of said integration.
  • Compiles or designs architectural models of current and proposed systems across the enterprise for use internally and in conjunction with Technology Partners.
  • Create the blueprints of Business Unit end-to-end business processes:

- Participate in building a Business Unit wide process map together with business;

- Initiate and stimulate blueprints designs preparation;

- Provide methodology support in drawing To-Be processes and blueprints;

  • Realization of integration projects:

- make fit/gap analysis

- prepare functional and technical design

- make customizing and prepare developments specifications

- prepare test scenarios, user manuals, conduct trainings for key/end users

- support project go-live and hypercare

  • Liaise with Business Expertise Center (BEC) team to transfer completed project to support
  • Control change management process, suggestion alternatives, selection most appropriate way of implementation change management demand, approval suggested technical solution.
  • Interaction with Europe Solutions team to align integration project activities. Support project managers in preparation of Architecture Board Committees presentation
  • Interaction with 3d party providers to control and deliver project activities according to project plan

Requirements:

  • Higher education (Management Sciences / Engineering / Mathematics)
  • Minimum 2 years in a similar role
  • Successfully developed and implemented new work processes or process improvements
  • Experience in structured data system modeling and maintenance.
  • Knowledge of fundamental information architecture concepts, methods and theories
  • Supply Chain (especially in the area of planning) business processes knowledge
  • Functional knowledge of SAP Business Suite including SAP ERP (MM,LE,PM,PP,QM), SAP APO (DP, SNP, GATP, PP/DS)
  • Detailed knowledge of SAP Data warehousing and BI platform, SAP EIM enabling solutions
  • Strong collaboration & teamwork skills
  • Strong communication and presentation skills; Able to communicate with all management levels
  • Strong analytical skills
  • Good English written and spoken
  • Ability to be flexible by adapting quickly to changing priorities
  • Experience in communication with all management levels
  • Experience in working in a multi-national environment.
